Package wallBrick

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
wallBrick.Wall
public class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
This class is to create the wall for the game

  • Constructor Details

    • Wall

      public Wall​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, java.awt.Point ballPos)
      this is to initialise the variables in Wall class
      Parameters:
      drawArea - calculate the area of the player
      brickCount - count the number of bricks
      lineCount - number of rows of brick
      brickDimensionRatio - the height to width ratio of the bricks
      ballPos - the position of the ball

  • Method Details

    • makeSingleTypeLevel

      private Brick[] makeSingleTypeLevel​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int type)
      this is to make a level for the game
      Parameters:
      drawArea - area where the bricks are on
      brickCnt - the number of bricks
      lineCnt - the number of rows of bricks
      brickSizeRatio - the height to width ratio
      type - types of brick (Clay, Steel, or Cement)
      Returns:
      the brick of the level

    • makeChessboardLevel

      private Brick[] makeChessboardLevel​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int typeA, int typeB)
      making a level that alternates the different bricks.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - area where the bricks are on
      brickCnt - the number of bricks
      lineCnt - the number of rows of bricks
      brickSizeRatio - the height to width ratio for the brick
      typeA - types of brick (Clay, Steel, or Cement)
      typeB - types of brick (Clay, Steel, or Cement)
      Returns:
      the bricks for the level

    • makeLevels

      private Brick[][] makeLevels​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio)
      this is to make the level for the game
      Parameters:
      drawArea - area where the bricks are on
      brickCount - the number of bricks
      lineCount - the number of rows of bricks
      brickDimensionRatio - the height to width ratio for the brick
      Returns:
      the tmp variable which holds the levels in game
